game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious artifact is said to be hidden deep within the forgotten ruins. Retrieve it and bring back its secrets.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the old hermit in the nearby woods for clues about the ruins' location.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact
task.description: Beware of traps and overcome any challenges that guard the artifact.
